EmailTemplate.name: 12174.Wi-fi Airscale promo at Anga Com 2017.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: We create the technology to connect the world
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Global Partner Program Partners,
If you are not yet connected with us on social media, here are some quick minute highlights you may have missed from the Nokia Partner Program.
Wi-Fi launch on Twitter Flexible options make it simple for you to manage and control your Wi-Fi deployment centrally from the cloud, or let Nokia do this for you. Discover how perfect Wi-Fi connectivity allows you to differentiate and make money from digital services with the Nokia AirScale Wi-Fi solution. Watch “Plug and Play Wi-Fi” video
<[[https://twitter.com/nokianetworks/status/869877436032446471]]> Watch “The successful journey with Nokia Wi-Fi begins now” video
<[[https://twitter.com/nokianetworks/status/869954661020774401]]> Follow us on Twitter
<[[https://twitter.com/nokianetworks]]> IP Networks Reimagined Get a front row seat at the IP Networks Reimagined livestream event with Rajeev Suri, CEO of Nokia, and Basil Alwan, President, IP/Optical Networks Business Group, as they share Nokia’s vision and strategy on the evolution of IP networks.
Don’t miss out on this ultimate viewing experience and exciting opportunity to be among the first to see the unveiling of new innovations from Nokia, livestreamed in 360° video with Nokia OZO.
Register to experience the 360o livestream <[[https://pages.nokia.com/11251.IP-Networks-Reimagined.html]]>
#NetworksReimagined <[[https://twitter.com/hashtag/NetworksReimagined?src=hash]]>
Nokia Partner Marketing & Communications Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
